definition: for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized
topic/problem for discussion/exam question/subject/to inscribe/to mention/CL:個|个[ge4],道[dao4]

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: I work in the television station, mainly responsible for recording films on specialist subject.
sentences.chinese: 我在電視臺工作，主要負責錄製專題片。

sentences.english: The language of artistic figure Tv puogramm have both speciality and artistry.
sentences.chinese: 藝術類人物專題片語言兼有專業性和藝術性兩大特點。

sentences.english: His five feature films span four decades.
sentences.chinese: 他的五個專題片跨越四十年。

definition: lit. dragon soaring and tiger leaping (idiom)/fig. prosperous and bustling/vigorous and active
lit. paper has become expensive in Luoyang (because everyone is making a copy of a popular story) (idiom)/fig. (of a product) to sell like hotcakes
to churn out large quantities without regard for quality (idiom); rough and slipshod work
after hard work and numerous revisions (idiom)/the vicissitudes of life
